text: Kris Kross was an Atlanta-based hip hop duo. Its members were Chris "Mac Daddy" Kelly and Chris "Daddy Mac" Smith. Their most notable song was "Jump" in 1992. The duo also had other hits including "Warm it Up". They were noted for wearing their clothes backwards. Their following albums did not do as well. The duo ended around 1998. Member Chris Kelly was found unresponsive in his Atlanta home and was pronounced dead on May 1, 2013. ==References== Category:1990s American music groups Category:American rap music groups Category:Musical duos Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1998 Category:Musical groups established in 1992 Category:Musical groups from Atlanta
title: Kris Kross
